msg: add a 2.3.9-era CHANGES entry that should have been noted for

author: kocolosk
msg: Content-Length and the HTTP body are returned as 0 and an empty binary

author: kocolosk
msg: Stem revision trees after merging a path, COUCHDB-968

author: kocolosk
msg: This patch ensures that we only ever merge a linear path into the tree.
It relies on the stemming code to collapse paths that could have been
merged together by a recursive use of merge_one.

author: nick
msg: More NPOIFS BAT vs XBAT confusion fixes. Also fixes recent POIFS regression on big files, and adds a POIFS unit test for XBAT containing files (previously there wasn't one)
